meanings.definition: A person who cuts, styles, or arranges hair.
meanings.sent1: The coiffeurs at the salon gave me a trendy haircut.
meanings.sent2: I always trust my favorite coiffeurs to make my hair look great.
meanings.sent3: The coiffeurs decided to have a hair styling competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like skilled coiffeurs, shaping the hair effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The coiffeurs' scissors snipped away, transforming the messy hair into a work of art.
